CustomField.formula:
CASE( Intent__c,
"LPMS", "Learn what practice management software is and how it can help me", "Features", "Understand MyCase features and see if it is the best fit for me", "Setup", "I'm ready to use MyCase and want to get up and running",
IF( TEXT(Trial_Status__c) = "Activated", "No intent provided", ""))
CustomField.label: Intent Summary
